title: September 11: Always Remember
description: September 11, 2001, is a tragic day in the minds and hearts of Americans. This book introduces students to the events of that day in an age-appropriate manner. It also discusses how Americans remember and mark September 11 as a day of mourning and includes information on what has been done across the country to honor those who died and those who tried to save them.
